Package bn.core

Interface BayesianNetwork

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIMAAlarmNetwork, AIMAWetGrassNetwork, BayesianNetwork
    public interface BayesianNetwork
    A BayesianNetwork is a directed acyclic graph where the nodes correspond to RandomVariables and store the conditional distribution of their variable given its parents.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(RandomVariable var)
      Add a node for the given RandomVariable to this BayesianNetwork.
      void connect​(RandomVariable var, java.util.Set<RandomVariable> parents, CPT cpt)
      Connect the node for the given RandomVariable to the nodes for the given set of parent RandomVariables, with the given CPT.
      BayesianNetwork copy()
      Return a copy of this BayesianNetwork that uses the same RandomVariables, but has its own copies of the CPTs (initialized to this network's values).
      java.util.Set<RandomVariable> getChildren​(RandomVariable var)
      Return the RandomVariables that are Children of the given RandomVariable.
      java.util.Set<RandomVariable> getParents​(RandomVariable var)
      Return the RandomVariables that are parents of the given RandomVariable.
      double getProbability​(RandomVariable X, Assignment e)
      Return the probability stored in the CPT for the given RandomVariable, given the Values of its parents (and of itself) in the given Assignment.
      RandomVariable getVariableByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Return the RandomVariable with the given name from this BayesianNetwork.
      java.util.Set<RandomVariable> getVariables()
      Return the RandomVariables used in this BayesianNetwork.
      java.util.List<RandomVariable> getVariablesSortedTopologically()
      Return the RandomVariables used in this BayesianNetwork sorted topologically (so that parents precede their children).
      void setProbability​(RandomVariable X, Assignment e, double p)
      Set the probability stored in the CPT for the given RandomVariable, given the Values of its parents (and of itself) in the given Assignment.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add​(RandomVariable var)
        Add a node for the given RandomVariable to this BayesianNetwork. Note: This is called when a variable entity is read in an XMLBIF file.

      • connect

        void connect​(RandomVariable var,
             java.util.Set<RandomVariable> parents,
             CPT cpt)
        Connect the node for the given RandomVariable to the nodes for the given set of parent RandomVariables, with the given CPT. Note: This is called when a definition entity is read in an XMLBIF file.

      • getVariables

        java.util.Set<RandomVariable> getVariables()
        Return the RandomVariables used in this BayesianNetwork.

      • getVariablesSortedTopologically

        java.util.List<RandomVariable> getVariablesSortedTopologically()
        Return the RandomVariables used in this BayesianNetwork sorted topologically (so that parents precede their children).

      • getParents

        java.util.Set<RandomVariable> getParents​(RandomVariable var)
        Return the RandomVariables that are parents of the given RandomVariable.

      • getChildren

        java.util.Set<RandomVariable> getChildren​(RandomVariable var)
        Return the RandomVariables that are Children of the given RandomVariable.

      • getProbability

        double getProbability​(RandomVariable X,
                      Assignment e)
        Return the probability stored in the CPT for the given RandomVariable, given the Values of its parents (and of itself) in the given Assignment.

      • setProbability

        void setProbability​(RandomVariable X,
                    Assignment e,
                    double p)
        Set the probability stored in the CPT for the given RandomVariable, given the Values of its parents (and of itself) in the given Assignment.

      • getVariableByName

        RandomVariable getVariableByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Return the RandomVariable with the given name from this BayesianNetwork.

      • copy

        BayesianNetwork copy()
        Return a copy of this BayesianNetwork that uses the same RandomVariables, but has its own copies of the CPTs (initialized to this network's values).

        BayesianNetworks must support the copy() operation for some learning algorithms, such as EM. If you don't use those algorithms, implement this method and throw an UnsupportedOperationException.
